snippet: Gerson Zweifach of the Washington law firm Williams & Connolly will fill a position at News Corporation that has been vacant since June.
abstract: Gerson Zweifach of the Washington law firm Williams & Connolly will fill a position at News Corporation that has been vacant since June.
lead_paragraph: 12:27 p.m. | Updated News Corporation has hired a new general counsel, filling a permanent position that has been vacant since June.

headline.main: News Corporation Hires New General Counsel
